ILR FileMerge Formerly known as the amalgamation tool.

ILR FileMerge is for learning providers who return Individualised Learner Records (ILR). Use it to combine .xml files into a single file for upload to the Funding Information Service (FIS) or Submit Learner Data.

Download the latest ILR FileMerge tool

Last updated 22 July 2019
